question: 敵
sourceAnswer:
<read>かたき</read>:: rival/opponent/adversary/competitor/enemy-(esp.-one-with-which-there-is-longstanding-enmity)/foe | revenge | spouse
<read>てき</read>:: opponent/rival/adversary | menace/danger/threat/enemy
sourceMnemonic:
The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.

<ja>てき</ja> and <ja>かたき</ja>, however, have slightly different nuances. <ja>てき</ja> simply means “enemy”, whereas <ja>かたき</ja> typically refers to someone you hold a deep grudge against, often on behalf of another.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading is the same as what you learned with the kanji. No enemies here!
